feedback.text: Excellent at building relationships across the organization. People trust her judgment and seek her input.
Good technical knowledge that helps in making sound decisions.
Exceptional strategic thinker. Has consistently demonstrated the ability to see the big picture while managing the details.
Reliable team player who meets deadlines.
Creates a supportive environment where team members feel valued.
Outstanding mentor. Has helped me grow professionally in ways I didn't think possible. The entire team has benefited from her guidance over the past year.
Makes time for the team despite busy schedule.
Has demonstrated remarkable business acumen that has directly contributed to our department exceeding targets for three consecutive quarters.
Sometimes takes on too much work which can impact quality.
Needs to delegate more effectively. This has been a consistent issue that has led to bottlenecks in team workflow and missed opportunities for team development.
Communication during high-stress periods could be more consistent. Team sometimes feels out of the loop on important decisions.
Feedback can sometimes be too gentle when more direct criticism would be helpful.

Major concern with meeting facilitation. Meetings often run over time and lack clear outcomes. This has been noted by multiple team members and has impacted cross-functional project timelines repeatedly.
Could be more visible with senior leadership. Missing opportunities to showcase team achievements.
